column7: Covers current authoritative accounting standards and applications to accounting practice. Topics include accounting for business combinations, the preparation of consolidated financial statements, and other advanced financial reporting topics. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Credit is not given for both ACCY 506 and ACCY 532. Prerequisite: ACCY 501, and credit or concurrent enrollment in ACCY 502.
